body: @AnotherRat Another good question. She wasn’t that darkskinned when she showed up in the stinger of Pai-Lolis 3. Wonder why Sorimura decided to change her like that.
Why the hell is she so dark? I mean, she doesn't look like the one in the first pic
@ederstk That…doesn’t actually answer my question…is it mindbreak, or not?
@omnimon11  Good question. What I believe has happened is that she stayed in this state permanently, that she did not even concentrate on the training as can be seen on page 16...

After Amane (dark-skinned girl) has sex with the Pai-Loli manager for the first time, she has those little hearts in her eyes for every single panel she's in after that point (page 12-onwards), regardless of whether she's being fucked or not. Not trying to nitpick or anything; just curious, but doesn't that count as mindbreak?
